<NEW>

BLANK - LOST - MEMORIES

The mechanized lion awoke in the cell, crimson optics flickering for a
moment and then becoming solid as systems check came back at full
health. Armor plating that was once torn was whole and energy levels
that had once been flagging were now briming along.

Then there was sounds . . .

> <OLD>
>
> The dog bot awoke to find itself in a heavily reinforced prison cell,
> looking to the window, he saw the faces of his captors, and immediately
> lunged at the glass.
>
> "You won't be getting out like last time." said Ravenchief. "This used to be
> a bomb shelter."
>
> This enraged him more and he began repeatedly clawing and slamming against
> the door.
>
> "Hey doctor, your patient is awake!"

<NEW>

Standing the dark colored lion turned towards the sounds of speech and
clawing, as he tilted his head to look. With a small growl roar he
shifted into a robot mode!

He stood  tall radiating a warrior's strength and power. His armor,
much like his cat form was constructed of a dark colored alloy a deep
purple (aubergine) and black. Even in robot mode his face and even
stance has a predatory look, although from his optics a quersting
intelligence could be seen. He stood several inches taller then the
average transformers, his broad frame displaying powerfully thick
robust protective armor plating. Each of his broad shoulders are
topped by long ranged mortar cannons.

He looked around at the dog bot and then at anyone else around him,
incomprehension dawning in his optics, "Where am I?" he said in deep
tones as he continued to look around, his clawed hands touching the
barrier around his cell as if testing it. He looked at those outside
his cage, "And who are you!" this last statement a demand.

OOC: I will assume that the CR chamber scanned him, so they should be
aware that he has other modes: Robot, Combat Tank,
Mecha-scorpion,Aerial Cannon, Star Fighter, Mecha-Lion. He still has
no faction signature, he only registers as Cybertronian.

(TAG)

Preston
